message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $14,000. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your counteroffer, but the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,500. I'm willing to pay $12,800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
